label: quote-50-ex-one
description:
1. Payment 50% advance along with purchase order and remaining 50% on completion of work / delivery.
2. Delivery ex-stock prior to sale.
3. One year warranty from the date of material delivery.

description:

2. Delivery within 4-8 weeks.
3. One year warranty from the date of material delivery.

3. One year warranty from the date of material delivery.

description:

description:

label: po-100-30-days
description:
Warranty: one year from the date of delivery.
